title: I want to make music similar to Lil Peeps. What can I do to make it different? - Quora

response.answer_text: As long as you talk about your own life experience and let your personality shine through, your music won’t sound just like Lil Peep and you’ll be fine. It’s good to be aware of your influences, and imitating other artists is a natural way to learn about making music. Give yourself permission to pursue your creativity wherever it takes you, sounding like Lil Peep or not.
